py.execnet: elastic distributed programming

Since pylib 1.1 "py.execnet" ceased to exist and is now available as a separately developed execnet standalone package.

If you have previosly used "py.execnet.*" and the 1.0 API just rename all occurences of the string "py.execnet." with the string "execnet." as execnet-1.0 is API compatible.
